comments.raw_text: I had that 'No database found' error [in CI](https://circleci.com/gh/mozilla/glean/60439?utm_campaign=workflow-failed&utm_medium=email&utm_source=notification) and :mdboom suggested we should maybe have `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` set so that we have a better chance of making things like these actionable.
comments.author: chutten@mozilla.com
comments.creator: chutten@mozilla.com
